name: drinaluza
description: Frontend of drinaluza. A mobile first app to manage small businesses
author: Ahmed Derbala <derbala.ahmed531992@gmail.com>

scripts.build: npx expo install --check && npx expo-doctor && NODE_ENV=production eas build --platform android --profile production --local --output=../drinaluza.apk
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean:only && npm run i && npm install -g eas-cli && npx expo prebuild --clean && rm -rf android && rm -rf ios && npx expo install --check && npx expo-doctor && NODE_ENV=production eas build --platform android --profile production --local --output=../drinaluza.apk
scripts.clean: npm run clean:only && npm run i && npm run start:local
scripts.update: npm run check-updates && npm run clean
scripts.push: npm run format && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.pull: git pull origin main && npm run i && npm run start:local
